author: grasph
body:
#### PR description:

Bug fix for the EcalDumpRaw expert tool, which is not used in the standard workflow.

o Fixed a bug in the EE TPG position (see  http://cmsonline.cern.ch/cms-elog/1141683). Bug report and fix provided by Evgueni Vassov
o CMSSW configuration file generated by the dumpRaw script was missing a parameter which was not needed before,

#### PR validation:

Run the dumpRaw script on a file example, freshly acquired at P5.
title: Bug fix for the EcalDumpRaw expert tool, which is not used in the standard workflow.
